item.title: Shift Gets Real 102: Culture, Blackness and Utter Confusion!
item.description: The differences between race, culture and ethnicity were learned the hard way! This weeks episode @dimitrisnowden and @ashleyksnowden talk about family culture, blackness and utter confusion! Our friend Nichole at @africanancestry can help clear this up!

item.title: Shift Gets Real 201: What's Inner Fitness and How to Get Over Sh%t!
item.description: We're back with another hot season of Shift Gets Real! This weeks @shiftgetsreal episode @dimitrisnowden and @ashleyksnowden chat with Tina Lifford from Queen Sugar about her book "Little Book of Big Lies" The idea of Inner Fitness is key to self worth, self love and gratitude.
